references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concepts and algorithms that are widely used in many subsequent works.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrated the superior performance of diffusion models over GANs for image synthesis, significantly advancing the practical applicability of diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provided a comprehensive analysis of different design choices in diffusion models, offering valuable insights for improving model efficiency and effectiveness.
This paper introduced classifier-free guidance, a crucial technique for controlling the generation process in diffusion models, allowing for fine-grained control over the generated images.

references.paper_title: Difffit: Unlocking transferability of large diffusion models via simple parameter-efficient fine-tuning
references.reason: This paper introduced a parameter-efficient fine-tuning method specifically designed for diffusion models, addressing the challenge of adapting large pre-trained models to downstream tasks with minimal computational cost.
